question: National Thermal Power Corporation(NTPC) signed MOU with which Indian Institute for the implementation of National Landscape Restoration Project(NLRP)?
explanation: National Thermal Power Corporation(NTPC) signed MOU with Indian Institute of Forest Management(IIFM) for the implementation of National Landscape Restoration Project(NLRP).Â  NTPC Ltd. and USAID will provide the funds in equal proportion for the implementation of this project.
